text: Ki tusim nahim vekhi'a ki alaha badalam nu cala'unda hai. Phira inham nu apisa vica mila dida hai. Phira inham di'am taiham te taiham vicha cida hai. Phira tusim varakha nu dekhade ho, jihari unham de vicom nikaladi hai. Ate uha asamana tom badalam de adara de paharam tom gare varasa'unda hai. Phira unham nu jisa te cahuda hai dega dida hai. Ate jisa tom cahuda hai, unham nu cauka dida hai. Usa di bijali di camaka tom ijha japada hai ki jinha nu cudhi'a devegi
